tasks.prompt: Determine the best design pattern for multi-platform CLI support.
tasks.decision: Use Strategy Pattern combined with a Plugin Registry.
tasks.rationale: Strategy pattern allows interchangeable algorithms (adapters) independent of clients. Registry manages lifecycle and selection logic.
tasks.alternatives: Conditional logic in every command (rejected: unmaintainable); Microservices (rejected: over-engineering for a CLI tool).

tasks.decision: Standardize around detect(), executeCommand(), and context management.
tasks.rationale: These three primitives cover the essential differences between execution environments.
tasks.alternatives: Event-based only (rejected: request-response is more common for command execution).
